name: Zombie Throwout (Mashup Game Jam 2)
description:
You are at a local grocery store when all of a sudden. ZOMBIES!? These zombies are not normal. You are imagining them. they can dissapear and teleport. You dont have a weapon on you. So what better option than to throw your friend at the zombies to stop them! Can you survive?

MADE FOR THE MASH UP GAME JAM 2021!

Quite nervous because ive never entered a gamejam and ive only learned how to program for 2 weeks.

Controls: arrow keys, Space bar to hold. let go to throw him.

Hope you enjoy!

If this gets popular I will make a windows exe for this dumb game
